text: Kuti Allah ŵape ilagasyo (ŵatanyosye malamusigo ŵali) achinakunaku ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, kwisa soni akuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu) ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe, ni kuti soni Allah ŵapochele toba (ŵatakunde malamusigo ŵali) ŵakulupilila ŵachilume ni ŵachikongwe. Sano Allah ni aŵele Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
